noConnection.title: Check your services
noConnection.message: The statistics service could not be reached within the last five seconds or just disconnected. Please make sure it is up and running. This client should then connect automatically. If successfully connected, a green icon will be displayed in the header/sidenav.

dig.illegalTrailing: Illegal trailing character. Must be lowercase letter or number.
